oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of town hall meeting about City of Nashville's annexation campaign, July 20, 1961
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of a town hall meeting about the City of Nashville's annexation campaign. This meeting was held at Glenview Elementary School on July 20, 1961. Former Nashville Mayor Ben West was a driving force behind this campaign to annex large portions of the Davidson County into the City of Nashville. Photograph depicts Councilman Malcolm L. Barrett speaking to audience; Mayor West is shown seated on Barrett's left. b & w; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Barrett, Malcolm L.; West, Ben;
